Of A Centurion <S%G1543><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Certain <S%G5100><s%> A Bondman <S%G1401><s%> Ill <S%G2560><s%> Being <S%G2192><s%> Was About <S%G3195><s%> To Die, <S%G5053><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> By Him <S%G846><s%> Honoured. <S%G1784><s%>

<S%G191><s%> And Having Heard <S%G1161><s%> About <S%G4012><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> He Sent <S%G649><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Elders <S%G4245><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Jews, <S%G2453><s%> Begging <S%G2065><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> That <S%G3704><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> He Might Cure <S%G1295><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1401><s%> His Bondman. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And They <S%G1161><s%> Having Come <S%G3854><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Besought <S%G3870><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Diligently, <S%G4709><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Worthy <S%G514><s%> He Is <S%G2076><s%> To Whom <S%G3739><s%> He Shall Grant <S%G3930><s%> This, <S%G5124><s%>

<S%G25><s%> For He Loves <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1484><s%> Our Nation <S%G2257><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Synagogue <S%G4864><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Built <S%G3618><s%> For Us. <S%G2254><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Went <S%G4198><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> Them; <S%G846><s%> <S%G2235><s%> But Already <S%G1161><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Far <S%G3112><s%> Being Distant <S%G568><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> House, <S%G3614><s%> Sent <S%G3992><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Centurion <S%G1543><s%> Friends, <S%G5384><s%> Saying <S%G3004><s%> , To Him, <S%G846><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Lord, <S%G3361><s%> Trouble Not Thyself, <S%G4660><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> I Am <S%G1510><s%> Worthy <S%G2425><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Under <S%G5259><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4721><s%> My Roof <S%G3450><s%> Thou Shouldest Come; <S%G1525><s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> Neither <S%G3761><s%> Myself <S%G1683><s%> Counted I Worthy <S%G515><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> To Come; <S%G2064><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Say <S%G2036><s%> By A Word, <S%G3056><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Shall Be Healed <S%G2390><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3816><s%> My Servant. <S%G3450><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> For Also <S%G1063><s%> I 1473 P-1NS A Man 444 N-NSM Am 1510 V-PXI-1S Under 5259 PREP Authority 1849 N-ASF Appointed, 5021 V-PPP-NSM Having 2192 V-PAP-NSM ' Under 5259 PREP Myself 1683 F-1ASM Soldiers, 4757 N-APM And 2532 CONJ I Say 3004 V-PAI-1S To This One 5129 D-DSM Go, 4198 V-AOM-2S And 2532 CONJ He Goes; 4198 V-PNI-3S And 2532 CONJ To Another, 243 A-DSM Come, 2064 V-PNI-2S And 2532 CONJ He Comes; 2064 V-PNI-3S And 2532 CONJ 3588 T-DSM 1401 N-DSM To My Bondman, 3450 P-1GS Do 4160 V-AAM-2S This, 5124 D-ASN And 2532 CONJ He Does It. 4160 V-PAI-3S

<S%G191><s%> And Having Heard <S%G1161><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Wondered At <S%G2296><s%> Him; <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Turning <S%G4762><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Following <S%G190><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Crowd <S%G3793><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> Not Even <S%G3761><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Israel <S%G2474><s%> So Great <S%G5118><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> Did I Find. <S%G2147><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Returned <S%G5290><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Sent <S%G3992><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3624><s%> Found <S%G2147><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sick <S%G770><s%> Bondman <S%G1401><s%> In Good Health. <S%G5198><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> It Came To Pass <S%G1096><s%> On <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Next Day <S%G1836><s%> He Went <S%G4198><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> A City <S%G4172><s%> Called <S%G2564><s%> Nain, <S%G3484><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Went With <S%G4848><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples <S%G846><s%> , Many <S%G2425><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> A Crowd <S%G3793><s%> Great. <S%G4183><s%>

<S%G5613><s%> And As <S%G1161><s%> He Drew Near <S%G1448><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Gate <S%G4439><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> City <S%G4172><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> , Behold, <S%G2400><s%> Was Being Carried Out One <S%G1580><s%> Who Had Died, <S%G2348><s%> An Son <S%G5207><s%> Only <S%G3439><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3384><s%> To His Mother, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> She <S%G846><s%> <S%G3778><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> A Widow, <S%G5503><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> A Crowd <S%G3793><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> City <S%G4172><s%> Considerable Was <S%G2425><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> Her. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Seeing <S%G1492><s%> Her <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Was Moved With Compassion <S%G4697><s%> ' On <S%G1909><s%> Her <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G846><s%> To Her, <S%G3361><s%> Weep Not. <S%G2799><s%>

<S%G2983><s%> And Seized <S%G1161><s%> Fear <S%G5401><s%> , All, <S%G537><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Glorified <S%G1392><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3004><s%> Saying, <S%G3754><s%> A Prophet <S%G4396><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> Has Risen Up <S%G1453><s%> Amongst <S%G1722><s%> Us; <S%G2254><s%> <S%G2532><s%> And <S%G3754><s%> Has Visited <S%G1980><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2992><s%> His People. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Went Out <S%G1831><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3056><s%> This Report <S%G3778><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> All <S%G3650><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Judea <S%G2449><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Country Around. <S%G4066><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Brought Word <S%G518><s%> To John <S%G2491><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples <S%G846><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> These Things. <S%G5130><s%>

<S%G565><s%> And Having Departed <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Messengers <S%G32><s%> Of John <S%G2491><s%> He Began <S%G756><s%> To Speak <S%G3004><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowds <S%G3793><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> John : <S%G2491><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Have Ye Gone Out <S%G1831><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wilderness <S%G2048><s%> To Look At? <S%G2300><s%> A Reed <S%G2563><s%> By The <S%G5259><s%> Wind <S%G417><s%> Shaken? <S%G4531><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Have Ye Gone Out <S%G1831><s%> To See? <S%G1492><s%> A Man <S%G444><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Soft <S%G3120><s%> Clothing <S%G2440><s%> Arrayed? <S%G294><s%> , Behold, <S%G2400><s%> They Who <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Clothing <S%G2441><s%> Splendid <S%G1741><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In Luxury <S%G5172><s%> Are Living <S%G5225><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Palaces <S%G934><s%> Are. <S%G1526><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Have Ye Gone Out <S%G1831><s%> To See? <S%G1492><s%> A Prophet? <S%G4396><s%> Yea, <S%G3483><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> And One <S%G2532><s%> More Excellent <S%G4053><s%> Than A Prophet. <S%G4396><s%>

This <S%G3778><s%> Is He <S%G2076><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> It Has Been Written, <S%G1125><s%> , Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Send 649 V-PAI-1S 3588 T-ASM 32 N-ASM My Messenger 3450 P-1GS Before 4253 PREP 4383 N-GSN Thy Face, 4675 P-2GS Who 3739 R-NSM Shall Prepare 2680 V-FAI-3S 3588 T-ASF 3598 N-ASF Thy Way 4675 P-2GS Before 1715 PREP Thee. 4675 P-2GS

I Say <S%G3004><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> A Greater <S%G3187><s%> Among Those <S%G1722><s%> Born <S%G1084><s%> Of Women <S%G1135><s%> Prophet <S%G4396><s%> Than John <S%G2491><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Baptist <S%G910><s%> No One <S%G3762><s%> Is; <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But He That Is <S%G1161><s%> Less <S%G3398><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Greater <S%G3187><s%> Than He <S%G846><s%> Is. <S%G2076><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> People <S%G2992><s%> Having Heard <S%G191><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tax Gatherers <S%G5057><s%> Justified <S%G1344><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> Having Being Baptized With <S%G907><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Baptism <S%G908><s%> Of John; <S%G2491><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Doctors Of The Law <S%G3544><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Counsel <S%G1012><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Set Aside <S%G114><s%> As To <S%G1519><s%> Themselves, <S%G1438><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Having Been Baptized <S%G907><s%> ' By <S%G5259><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G2036><s%> And Said <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> , Lord, <S%G2962><s%> To What <S%G5101><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Shall I Liken <S%G3666><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> Generation <S%G1074><s%> This? <S%G3778><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To What <S%G5101><s%> Are They <S%G1526><s%> Like? <S%G3664><s%>

Like <S%G3664><s%> Are They <S%G1526><s%> To Little Children <S%G3813><s%> <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> A Market Place <S%G58><s%> Sitting, <S%G2521><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4377><s%> <S%G4377><s%> One To Another <S%G240><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3004><s%> , We Piped <S%G832><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Ye Did Not Dance; <S%G3738><s%> We Mourned <S%G2354><s%> , To You, <S%G5213><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Ye Did Not Weep. <S%G2799><s%>

<S%G2064><s%> For Has Come <S%G1063><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Baptist <S%G910><s%> Neither <S%G3383><s%> Bread <S%G740><s%> Eating <S%G2068><s%> Nor <S%G3383><s%> Wine <S%G3631><s%> Drinking, <S%G4095><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Ye Say, <S%G3004><s%> A Demon <S%G1140><s%> He Has. <S%G2192><s%>
